colorTheory.description: The color palette for this resume/CV aims to convey professionalism and modernity.
colorTheory.mood: The colors evoke a sense of sophistication and trustworthiness.
colorTheory.accessibility: The chosen text and background colors ensure good readability and comply with WCAG AA standards.
colorTheory.colorRelationships: The primary and secondary colors provide a classic and elegant combination, while the accent color adds a refreshing touch.
